reason.html: replaced by pull request #1224 and pull request 1225

description.raw:
Noticed a problem with collada textures while reviewing gazebo_model pull request #[89](#!/osrf/gazebo_models/pull-request/89/new-door-for-task-5/diff#chg-drc_practice_hinged_door/meshes/door.dae). The original default behavior is to disable lighting and not to receive shadows. This doesn't seem like the common use case so I reversed the behavior. Lighting is enabled by default and the mesh will receive shadows.

![hinged_door_dae.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/1547669162-hinged_door_dae.png)

The left image shows the new rendering of the `hinged_door`, compared to the original behavior on the right

Let me know if I need to retarget this to a different branch.
description.html:
Noticed a problem with collada textures while reviewing gazebo_model pull request #89. The original default behavior is to disable lighting and not to receive shadows. This doesn't seem like the common use case so I reversed the behavior. Lighting is enabled by default and the mesh will receive shadows.

The left image shows the new rendering of the hinged_door, compared to the original behavior on the right

Let me know if I need to retarget this to a different branch.

title.raw: Enable lighting by default when loading collada meshes with textures
title.html: Enable lighting by default when loading collada meshes with textures
